text: The Ford Model A was a car made by the Ford Motor Company. It had a four- cylinder flat head engine. It replaced the Ford Model T, and was replaced by the Ford Model B and Ford Model 18. Though it was only made for five years, 4,849,340 Model As were made and sold. ==References== Model A Category:1920s automobiles Category:1930s automobiles The Ford Model A was made from 1928 through 1931. In 1932 Ford made the Model B which had a fuel pump attached to the motor.
